description.narrative: Adolescent participation is institutionalized at subnational governance system, which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Cross-Sectoral Adolescent Development, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The most deprived adolescents empowered and resilient to become social change agents towards creating more tolerant, peaceful and inclusive societies

description.narrative: Active youth engagement in decision-making and resilience building was supported at the sub-national level through capacity building, communication for development and advocacy supporting uninterrupted engagement of youth as risk communicators, community mobilizers and peer educators during the COVID-19 quarantine measures. | Status:Met | As-of Date:18/01/2021
